backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, love letter template, owner-gated media upload, and public media viewing with integrated access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking production promotion and smoke‑test features to their related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and behavior of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up root element and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/PRODUCTION_PROMOTION_V25.md: Record of promoting Version 25 preview to production with no code changes, including verification steps and release mode notes.
frontend/PRODUCTION_PROMOTION.md: Guide explaining how to promote an approved preview build to production, including verification and build steps.
frontend/PRODUCTION_SMOKE_TEST_RESULTS_V: Template for recording smoke test results for Version 25 across devices and sections of the Valentine flow.
frontend/PRODUCTION_SMOKE_TEST.md: Checklist for validating the full Valentine flow and UI behavior in production after deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component initializing release mode and managing navigation between welcome, quiz, and memories pages with providers.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Renders floating animated heart icons with randomized positions and timings.
frontend/src/components/FloatingPetals.t: Displays falling petal images with randomized animation settings.
frontend/src/components/LocalMemoriesPic: Allows users to select, preview, remove, and view local or preloaded images with lightbox support.
frontend/src/components/MediaGallery.tsx: Shows a gallery of uploaded media with deletion, error handling, lightbox, and video preview logic.
frontend/src/components/MediaUpload.tsx: Handles authenticated media uploads with validation, previews, progress tracking, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/MemoryLightbox.t: Provides a modal lightbox for displaying a single image with a close button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Initializes and controls looping background music playback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating love letters and media items via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles and custom Valentine-themed CSS variables, base styles, and utilities.
frontend/src/lib/queryClient.ts: Creates a configured React QueryClient with default stale times and disabled refetch-on-focus.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineMessage.tsx: Displays the love letter with fallback logic and optionally shows a memories picker with animations.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineQuiz.tsx: Implements an animated multiple‑choice Valentine quiz that advances on correct answers and triggers a completion callback.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineWelcome.tsx: Shows an animated Valentine-themed welcome screen and starts background music before beginning the experience.
frontend/src/utils/releaseMode.ts: Provides utilities to remove preview URL artifacts and initialize clean release mode behavior.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/valentine/loveLetter.ts: Exports the default love letter string used as fallback content.
frontend/src/valentine/preloadedMemories: Defines the list of default memory image paths for the memories viewer.
frontend/src/valentine/quizData.ts: Defines the QuizQuestion interface and provides an array of Valentine‑themed multiple‑choice quiz questions with correct answer indices.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, feature list, known issues, and notes for the Valentine quiz website.
